front.title: Energy Monitoring and Management of Networked Entities using SNMP and Role-Specific Sparse Tables

abstract.t: This document defines a subset of the Management Information Base(MIB) for power and energy monitoring of devices. The moduleaddresses devices identification, context information, and therelationship between reporting devices, remote devices, andmonitoring probes.This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB)for use with network management protocols. In particular it definesobjects for managing the power usage of a network entity.The energy management schema is split into one core table toenumerate the entities being managed and numerous sparse tableextensions that add role-specific functionality where appropriate.
